participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, loves to share her feelings through art and music.
participant_1.background: I play my guitar to express my feelings. I just got the most adorable teddy bear to add to my collection! I'm still exploring my cultural heritage. I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again. I am really excited to see how Game of Thrones ends.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Practical and laid-back, enjoys running and spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I have a very busy schedule, so I usually do laundry once a week. I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely. I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea. I love lasagna like I am Garfield. I lost my childhood dog when I was 10.

content.text: Hi there! I just got the most adorable teddy bear to add to my collection!
Hello! That's really cool, what's your favorite kind of bear?
I love teddy bears in general, but I think my favorite kind is the little brown ones with the red bow ties.
Aw, those are so cute! I can't get over the little hats they wear sometimes.
I know right! They're so adorable.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I play guitar to express my feelings.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I think I will. Thanks for the encouragement!
So, what are you looking forward to the most right now?
I'm really excited to see how Game of Thrones ends!
Me too! I'm not ready for it to be over.
I know right! It's been such a long journey.
It has! But it's been a good one.
